title: Williams-Sonoma Essentials of Baking: Recipes and Techniques for Succcessful Home Baking
description: A revised overview of the fine art of baking provides a close-up look at the fundamental ingredients, essential equipment, and basic techniques of successful baking, featuring step-by-step photographs, baking tips and tricks, more than 140 delicious recipTitle: Williams-Sonoma Essentials of BakingAuthor: Williams, Chuck (EDT)/ Burgett, Cathy (CON)/ Klivans, Elinor (CON)/ Pappas, Lou Seibert (CON)/ BarnPublisher: Little Brown & CoPublication Date: 2008/10/01Number of Pages: 320Binding Type: HARDCOVERLibrary of Congress: bl2008028430
author: Cathy Burgett
